title: Monsters! Incidental Wedding Guests
description: The week before Kennedy and Jason's wedding is busy. There are cake tastings, dress fittings, a formal ball, and, as their superhero personas the Phantom and the Wraith, fighting monsters.These behemoths are destructive, smell like snack food, and are only after one thing: Door Tech Industries technology.Adding to the chaos are their friends and families; Jason's grandmother has returned after having been missing for half a century, Kennedy's mom is dead-set on keeping things traditional, and Jason's best friend is kidnapped before the rehearsal.Kennedy and Jason just want to get married, preferably before the next monster attack.The second book of four in The Gates of Westmeath series.
author: Jen Desmarais
